definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: Bacon Bits , Parmesans Cheese , Black Olive .
sentences.chinese: 核桃，银鱼柳，培根末，帕玛森芝士，黑橄榄。

sentences.chinese: 意式笔尖面，节瓜，培根，番茄汁。

sentences.english: I gave away a block of cheddar cheese with crumbled bacon in it.
sentences.chinese: 我还放弃了一块切达干酪，里面还有切碎的培根肉。

sentences.english: Especially scrambled, with bacon or sausage.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是加了培根或烤肠的炒鸡蛋。

sentences.english: I don't like milk, I want sausage and pan-fried bacon.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢牛奶，我想吃香肠和煎培根。

sentences.english: Caesar Salad with Garlic Croutons, Bacon, Quail Eggs and White Anchovies.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒沙律配蒜香面包干，培根，鹌鹑蛋伴白凤尾鱼。

sentences.english: Put the onion and bacon into the middle of the cooked puff pastry base.
sentences.chinese: 把炒好的洋葱和培根放在烤好的酥皮外壳里面。

sentences.english: Creative alarm clock that wakes you up with the smell of bacon.
sentences.chinese: 每天用培根香味叫你起床的创意闹钟。

sentences.english: Bacon and eggs if she's craving protein.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要补充蛋白，可能会选培根加蛋。

sentences.english: Boiled potato mixed with mayonnaise and chopped bacon bits.
sentences.chinese: 煮土豆配蛋黄酱和培根碎。

sentences.english: Bacon every time One day, Mr. Bacon received airmail from Jack.
sentences.chinese: 一天，培根先生收到了来自杰克的航空邮件。

sentences.english: In the 400-meter match , he got ahead of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 在400米赛跑中，每次都是他领先培根先生。

sentences.english: Pine nut, Walnut, Gherkin, Anchovy, Bacon Bits, Parmesans Cheese, Black Olive.
sentences.chinese: 核桃，银鱼柳，培根末，帕玛森芝士，黑橄。

sentences.english: He's better at making eggs and bacon than I am.
sentences.chinese: 他做鸡蛋和培根比我做得好。

sentences.english: Bacon and fried eggs, toast and butter, coffee or tea.
sentences.chinese: 培根加煎蛋，烤面包加黄油，还有咖啡或者茶。

sentences.english: Mr. Bacon used to be a music CD agent.
sentences.chinese: 培根先生曾是一个音乐CD的代理商。
